items.name: Object_ImageMap
items.content:
# =================================================================== # # Script: Object_ImageMap # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Object_ImageMap extends gs.Object_Visual @objectCodecBlackList = ["parent", "subObjects"] ###* * An image-map object to display an image-map on screen. * * @module gs * @class Object_ImageMap * @extends gs.Object_Visual * @memberof gs * @constructor ### constructor: -> super ###* * The names of the images used for the different states of the image-map.
* * - 0 = Ground Image * - 1 = Hovered * - 2 = Unselected * - 3 = Selected * - 4 = Selected Hovered * * @property images * @type string[] ### @images = [] ###* * The hotspot data of the image-map. Each entry is a single hotspot on the image-map. * @property hotspots * @type gs.ImageMapHotspot[] ### @hotspots = [] ###* * The domain the object belongs to. * @property domain * @type string ### @domain = "com.degica.vnm.default" ###* * The color tone of the object used for the visual presentation. * @property tone * @type gs.Tone ### @tone = new gs.Tone(0, 0, 0, 0) ###* * The color of the object used for the visual presentation. * @property color * @type gs.Color ### @color = new gs.Color(255, 255, 255, 0) ###* * An event-emitter to emit events. * @property events * @type gs.Component_EventEmitter ### @events = new gs.Component_EventEmitter() ###* * The object's animator-component to execute different kind of animations like move, rotate, etc. on it. * @property animator * @type vn.Component_Animator ### @animator = new gs.Component_Animator() ###* * The object's visual-component to display the game object on screen. * @property visual * @type gs.Component_ImageMap ### @visual = new gs.Component_ImageMap() @addComponent(@animator) @addComponent(@visual) @addComponent(@events) ###* * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc. * * @method onDataBundleRestore. * @param Object data - The data-bundle * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context. ### onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) -> @subObjects = [] gs.Object_ImageMap = Object_ImageMap
